English: Kenchan, was something wrong last time?
Chinese: 小賢，你上次怎麼了？
German: Kenchan, hat neulich was nicht gestimmt?

English: Sorry, I wasn't feeling very well.
Chinese:
對不起，
上次我身體有點不舒服……
Korean:
미안해.
조금 몸 상태가 안 좋아져서…
German: Tut mir leid, ich war nicht gut drauf.

English: Are you okay?
Chinese: 你還好吧？
German: Geht es dir gut?

English: Eh!?
Chinese: 啊！
German: Was?!

English: Your hand! That finger!
Chinese:
小美的手……！
手指……！！
German: Deine Hand! Der Finger!

English: Is that digital noise obscuring your finger?
Chinese: 手指被雜訊蓋掉了……？
German: Verdeckt das digitale Flimmern deinen Finger?

English: Erika told me to check everybody one by one.
Chinese:
對了，她叫我
「一個一個確認大家的外表。」
Korean:
그러고 보니「한 명 한 명의 모습을 잘 확인해봐」라고
말했었지…
German:
Erika hat gesagt, ich soll mir jeden einzeln
anschauen.

English: What's wrong?
Chinese: 怎麼了？
German: Was ist los?

English:
I can't see your neck because of all the noise,
Yuki.
Chinese: 小雪的脖子都是雜訊看不清楚……
Korean: 유키짱은 목이 노이즈에 덮여서 보이지 않아…
German:
Bei all dem Flimmern kann ich deinen Hals nicht
sehen, Yuki.

English: What's going on?!
Chinese: 這、這是怎麼一回事……？
German: Was ist denn hier los?

English: Stop being so weird. Come on, let's play!
Chinese:
小賢好奇怪。
別在意這種事了，快來玩吧！
German:
Hör auf, dich so komisch zu verhalten. Los, lass
uns spielen!

English: What should we do?
Chinese: 有什麼遊戲，大家來玩玩吧？
German: Was sollen wir tun?

English: Haha hahaha hahahaha!
Chinese: 啊哈、啊哈哈、啊哈哈哈哈哈！
German: Hahahahahahahahaha!

English:
It's not just Micchan and Yuki. Everyone has noise
obscuring parts of their bodies.
Chinese:
……不只是小美跟小雪。
仔細一看，待在這裡的所有人
全身上下都有許多破碎的雜訊……
Korean:
…밋짱과 유키짱만이 아니야.
잘 보니 여기 있는 모두가
몸 여기저기에 노이즈가 보여
German:
Es sind nicht nur Micchan und Yuki. Das Flimmern
verdeckt bei allen Körperteile.

English: Why didn't I notice it before?
Chinese: 為、為什麼我之前都沒發現？
Korean: 어, 어째서 지금까지 눈치채지 못한 거지?
German: Warum ist mir das vorher nicht aufgefallen?

English: Could we have your attention please?!
Chinese:
好了～大家看過來！
開心的同學會現在結束了！
German: Könnt ihr bitte mal herhören?!

English: You?!
Chinese: 是、是你們……！！
German: Ihr?!

English: Who are they?
Chinese: 那個人是誰？
German: Wer seid ihr?

English: Who are you? We reserved this space!
Chinese:
你們是哪來的？
這裡可是我們包下來的場地耶！
Korean:
너희들 누구야?
여기는 우리만의 전세 공간이라고!
German: Wer seid ihr? Wir haben diesen Ort reserviert!

English:
We're hackers! We've got something important to
tell you.
Chinese:
我們是駭客！
有很重要的事要跟你們說。
Korean:
우리는 해커야!
너희들에게 중요한 이야기가 있어
German:
Wir sind Hacker! Wir haben euch etwas Wichtiges
zu sagen.

English: Hang on a moment! You didn't need to come here!
Chinese:
先、先等一下，
你們用不著闖進來吧！
Korean:
자, 잠깐 기다려
굳이 여기까지 오지 않아도!
German: Moment mal! Ihr dürft nicht hier sein!

English:
Do you know those people? We promised we wouldn't
let any outsiders come.
Chinese:
等等～那個人是小賢認識的人嗎？
我們不是說好不可以放外人進來？
Korean:
잠깐~ 그 사람 켄짱이랑 아는 사이야?
부외자는 들이지 않겠다고 약속했잖아
German:
Kennst du diese Leute? Wir hatten versprochen,
keine Fremden herzubringen.

English:
It was your idea. You said outsiders would ruin
our memories.
Chinese:
說這樣會毀了回憶的人，
不就是小賢你嗎？
Korean:
추억이 엉망이 되어버린다고
그렇게 말한 건 켄짱이잖아
German:
Das war deine Idee. Du meintest, Fremde würden
den Nostalgieeffekt ruinieren.

English: I...I'm sorry. I...
Chinese: 對、對不起……可是，這是因為……那個……
German: Das ... Das tut mir leid. Ich ...

English:
Everyone, relax. We'll explain everything. Just
listen to what Erika has to say.
Chinese:
大家先冷靜下來。
我們會好好解釋，先聽艾莉卡的話吧。
Korean:
다들 진정해.
제대로 사정을 이야기할 테니까, 에리카의 이야기를 들어줘
German:
Entspannt euch mal alle. Wir werden alles
erklären. Hört euch einfach an, was Erika zu
sagen hat.

English: Fine, but then you have to go!
Chinese:
好吧，只聽一下還可以……
但你們說完就要離開這裡！
Korean:
뭐어, 잠깐이라면…
하지만 이야기 다 하면 바로 나가라고!
German: Na schön, aber dann müsst ihr gehen!

English: We will, we promise.
Chinese: 好，這沒問題。
German: Das werden wir, versprochen.

English: Everyone, count your fingers.
Chinese: ……大家麻煩數一下自己有幾根手指。
German: Zählt mal alle eure Finger.

English: What are you talking about? Why would we...?
Chinese:
你在說什麼鬼？
手指頭又怎麼了…………
German: Wovon redest du?! Warum sollen wir ...?

English: What's going on?! My finger!
Chinese:
等、等一下！？
我的指頭……！
German: Was ist los?! Mein Finger!

English: One, two, three... Huh? What is this?
Chinese:
1、2、3……奇怪？
怎麼會這樣？
German: Eins, zwei, drei ...Hä? Was soll das?

English: Don't let them fool you. Look. One, two, three...
Chinese:
你們別被唬了。
指頭哪有問題……1、2、3……
Korean:
너네들, 속지 마.
손가락이 뭐 어쨌다고…1, 2, 3…
German:
Lasst euch nicht von ihnen hineinlegen. Eins,
zwei, drei ...

English: Ah!
Chinese: 啊！
German: Ah!

English: There's only nine...
Chinese: 只有9根……
German: Es sind bloß neun ...

English: As you can see, each of you is missing one finger.
Chinese:
所有人的左手跟右手其中一邊，
都少了一根指頭對吧？
Korean: 다들, 좌우 어느 한쪽 손에서 하나씩 사라져 있지?
German: Wie ihr seht, fehlt jedem von euch ein Finger.

English: Now count how many of you there are.
Chinese: 接下來，你們數數看這裡有多少同伴吧？
Korean: 다음으로, 여기 있는 친구들의 수를 세어볼래?
German: Und jetzt zählt mal, wie viele ihr seid.

English: One, two, three...
German: Eins, zwei, drei ...

English: Four, five, six...
German: Vier, fünf, sechs ...

English: Seven, eight, nine... Ah!
German: Sieben, acht, neun ... Ah!

English: No way...
Chinese: 難不成，
German: Unmöglich ...

English: There's...
Chinese: 我們……
German: Wir sind ...

English: There's...
Chinese: 我們……
German: Wir sind ...

English: Ten of us!
Chinese: 總共有10個人！？
German: Wir sind zu zehnt!

English: Correct. There's someone here you don't know.
Chinese:
沒錯，你們總共有10個人。
也就是說有個陌生的外人混進來了。
Korean:
그래, 너희들은 10명 있어.
다시 말해, 모르는 누군가가 섞여 들어와 있어
German: Korrekt. Hier ist jemand, den ihr nicht kennt.

English: How's that possible?!
Chinese: 怎麼可能！？
German: Wie ist das möglich?!

English:
We reserved this area through the proper channels.
No one could just wander in!
Chinese:
我們是透過正規管道包下這個場子，
沒有人能擅自闖入！
Korean:
이 전세 에어리어는 정규 절차를 밟았어.
멋대로 들어오다니, 있을 수 없어!
German:
Wir haben diesen Bereich entsprechend den Regeln
reserviert. Da kann niemand einfach dazukommen!

English:
A hacker of Erika's skill wouldn't find it
difficult.
Chinese:
這種程度的隔離區域，像艾莉卡那種等級的駭客，
三兩下就能入侵了。
Korean:
이 정도 격리 에어리어, 에리카네 정도 되는 해커라면
간단하게 침입할 수 있어
German:
Für einen Hacker, der so gut ist wie Erika, wäre
das nicht schwierig.

English: And it might not be a hacker...
Chinese: 不過不速之客也未必是駭客啦……
Korean: 물론 침입자가 꼭 해커라는 건 아니지만…
German: Aber es muss kein Hacker sein.

English: But we all know each other!
Chinese: 可、可是我們都很熟悉大家的長相！
Korean: 하, 하지만 우리는 서로의 얼굴을 잘 알고 있어!
German: Aber wir kennen uns doch alle!

English:
We'd know if there was someone here who shouldn't
be!
Chinese:
不管是駭客還是什麼人，
要是有陌生人混進來，應該都能馬上察覺！
Korean:
해커든 누구든, 모르는 녀석이 들어와 있으면
금방 눈치챌 거야!
German:
Wir wüssten, wenn jemand hier wäre, der nicht
hier sein sollte!

English: You've been tricked by a shapeshifter.
Chinese: 這就是座敷童子的把戲。
German: Ihr wurdet von einem Formwandler hereingelegt.

English:
One finger has been stolen from each of you. Nine
fingers in total.
Chinese:
你們都被偷了1根指頭，只剩下9根。
被偷走的指頭合計有9根。
Korean:
당신들은 손가락을 하나씩 도둑맞아서 9개밖에 없어.
훔쳐간 손가락을 합치면 9개
German:
Jedem von euch wurde ein Finger gestohlen,
insgesamt neun Finger.

English:
The shapeshifter has used them to disguise itself
as a tenth person.
Chinese: 也就是說會剩下「與在場的人相同數量的手指」。
Korean: 다시 말해『여기 있는 모두와 같은 한 명 몫』인 거야
German:
Der Formwandler hat sie benutzt, um sich als
10. Person zu tarnen.

English:
Other parts of your bodies are also gradually
being stolen.
Chinese:
而除此之外，你們身體應該還有某些部分
也被偷走了一點。
Korean:
거기에, 당신들은 그 이외에도 몸의 어딘가를
조금씩 도둑맞았을 거야
German:
Allmählich werden euch auch andere Körperteile
gestohlen.

English:
The creature will combine them with the fingers to
change its disguise.
Chinese:
把這些部位組合起來，
就會多了一個跟你們一樣只有9根手指頭的小朋友……
Korean:
그 부분을 조합해서
당신들과 같은 손가락이 아홉 개인 아이가 한 명…
German:
Die Kreatur nutzt sie mit den Fingern, um
ihre Tarnung zu verändern.

English: That's why there are ten people here.
Chinese: 出現在這個地方。
German: Darum sind 10 Leute hier.

English: But why didn't we notice it before?!
Chinese:
居、居然有這種事……
那為什麼我們到現在都沒發現！
Korean:
그, 그런…
그러면 왜 지금까지 눈치채지 못한 거야!
German: Aber warum ist uns das vorher nicht aufgefallen?!

English: Because the shapeshifter looks like everyone here.
Chinese:
那是因為從所有人身上偷走身體部位的座敷童子，
跟在場的每個人長得都很像。
Korean:
그건, 모두에게서 몸의 부분을 훔쳐내 만든 꼬마 유령은
여기에 있는 모두와 닮았기 때문이야
German: Weil der Formwandler wie alle hier aussieht.

English:
Just not like any one specific person. However,
I know who it is!
Chinese:
但這個人卻又不是裡頭任何一人……
不過我看得出這個人是誰。
Korean:
하지만 아무도 아닌, 그런 존재…
하지만 우리는 알았어
German:
Aber niemand Spezifisches. Ich weiß allerdings,
wer es ist!

English: You! Show your true form!
Chinese:
這個人就是你！
快現出你的原型吧！
German: Du! Zeig deine wahre Form!

English: Hahahahaha! Well done!
Chinese:
啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！
真虧你能看穿我！
German: Hahahahaha! Gute Arbeit!

English:
Now to steal some different parts and change my
disguise again!
Chinese:
那我就再偷一次這裡所有人的身體部位，
重組身體吧！
Korean:
그럼 여기 있는 전원의 부분을 다시 훔쳐서
다시 한번 섞어버리자!
German:
Jetzt muss ich andere Teile stehlen und meine
Tarnung wieder ändern!

English: Just like a game of hide-and-seek! Hahahahaha!
Chinese:
現在開始大家最愛的捉迷藏！
啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！
German: Quasi ein Versteckspiel! Hahahahaha!
